metadata.info: glam2 [options] alphabet my_seqs.fa Main alphabets: p = proteins, n = nucleotides Main options (default settings): -h: show all options and their default settings -o: output file (stdout) -r: number of alignment runs (10) -n: end each run after this many iterations without improvement (10000) -2: examine both strands - forward and reverse complement -z: minimum number of sequences in the alignment (2) -a: minimum number of aligned columns (50) -b: maximum number of aligned columns (2) -w: initial number of aligned columns (20)
